text: Red Line 7000 is a 1965 American action drama movie directed by Howard Hawks and starring James Caan, Laura Devon, Charlene Holt, Marianna Hill, Norman Alden, George Takei, Teri Garr, Dee Hartford. It was distributed by Paramount Pictures. ==Other websites== * Category:1960s action movies Category:1965 drama movies Category:American action movies Category:American drama movies Category:Movies directed by Howard Hawks Category:Paramount Pictures movies
title: Red Line 7000
